content: **crocheted basket in drops merino extra fine theme halloween ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern me-226 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx diameter = 10 cm height = 5-6 cm **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 41 olive 1 basket weighs approx 17 g crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm **crochet gauge** 20 treble crochets in width and 10 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
